'''Passives''' are effects on [[Weapon]]s that can provide additional [[Attribute]]s or effects based on certain conditions. They are upgraded by increasing the [[Refinement Rank]] of the Weapon. [[1-Star Weapon|1-Star]] and [[2-Star Weapon|2-Star]] Weapons do not have passives.
